event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{You might be using variable {0} before verifying that it is >= 0.}{{code{j}}}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: A memory location at a negative offset from the beginning of the array will be read, resulting in incorrect values.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: Read from array at negative index
